titleStmt.title: Contemplations vpon the historie of the old Testament. The seuenth volume. In two bookes. By Ios. Hall D.D.
Contemplations upon the principall passages of the Holy Storie. Vol. 7

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by I. Haviland for Nath. Butter,

notesStmt.note: The first volume was issued under the title: Contemplations upon the principall passages of the holy storie.
A variant of the edition with H. Fetherstone's name in the imprint.
Identified as STC 12658a on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
